metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: This show shares the uplifting, character-driven humor found in 'Ted Lasso' and 'Scrubs', focusing on a positive workplace environment and lovable characters.

metas.name: The Office (US)
metas.description: A classic mockumentary sitcom with sharp wit and memorable characters, similar to the ensemble comedy of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' but with a warmer tone.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: This show is incredibly meta and features diverse comedic styles and strong character dynamics, appealing to a viewer who enjoys the clever humor of 'It's Always Sunny' and the animation humor of 'The Simpsons'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: A feel-good sitcom with a fantastic ensemble cast and a blend of workplace humor and lighthearted crime-solving, reminiscent of the comedic aspects in 'Brassic' but with a more procedural structure.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: This mockumentary about vampire roommates offers brilliantly absurd humor and character interactions that fans of 'It's Always Sunny's' chaotic energy will appreciate.

metas.name: Abbott Elementary
metas.description: A heartwarming and hilarious mockumentary sitcom about dedicated teachers in an underfunded public school, echoing the optimistic spirit of 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: A philosophical comedy that is consistently witty, surprising, and ultimately heartwarming, fitting the bill for smart comedy like 'Scrubs' and the uplifting nature of 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Schitt's Creek
metas.description: This show starts with a fish-out-of-water premise and evolves into a deeply heartwarming story about family and personal growth, with plenty of comedic moments akin to 'Ted Lasso's' charm.

metas.name: Letterkenny
metas.description: A quick-witted, character-driven comedy with a unique style of humor that fans of 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Goodness Gracious Me' might enjoy for its distinctive comedic voice.

metas.name: Master of None
metas.description: Offers a blend of insightful comedy and relatable slice-of-life stories, with a sophisticated humor that might appeal to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: A densely packed, brilliantly absurd sitcom with recurring jokes and complex character relationships that rewards attentive viewing, similar to the intricate humor in 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Kim's Convenience
metas.description: A warm and funny sitcom about a Korean-Canadian family running a convenience store, offering lighthearted humor and feel-good moments like 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Taskmaster
metas.description: This reality competition show features comedians attempting bizarre and hilarious challenges. It's pure, unadulterated fun and absurdity that fans of chaotic comedy will love.

metas.name: The Great British Baking Show
metas.description: The ultimate feel-good reality competition. It's wholesome, low-stakes, and focuses on creativity and kindness, perfect for pure relaxation.

metas.name: Somebody Feed Phil
metas.description: A travelogue show where Phil Rosenthal eats his way around the world with infectious enthusiasm. It's pure joy and positivity, great for background viewing.

metas.name: Blue Planet II
metas.description: While a nature documentary, its stunning visuals and David Attenborough's calming narration make it incredibly relaxing and awe-inspiring, fitting the 'feel-good' criteria in a unique way.

metas.name: Staged
metas.description: A comedy series filmed during lockdown featuring actors playing fictionalized versions of themselves. It's witty, relatable, and very lighthearted.

metas.name: MythBusters
metas.description: A fun and educational show that explores science through experiments. It's engaging without being demanding, offering a sense of discovery.

metas.name: Detectorists
metas.description: A quiet, charming, and beautifully written comedy about two friends who spend their days searching for treasure. It’s gentle, philosophical, and incredibly comforting.

metas.name: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
metas.description: With its fast-paced dialogue, vibrant visuals, and empowering protagonist, this show offers a stylish and funny escape, similar to the comedic spirit of 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: American Dad!
metas.description: From the creator of 'Family Guy', this animated sitcom offers a more absurd and satirical take on family life, appealing to fans of 'The Simpsons' and 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Bob's Burgers
metas.description: A beloved animated sitcom known for its quirky characters, warm family dynamics, and surprisingly heartfelt stories. It's a step up in wholesomeness from 'It's Always Sunny' but maintains a strong comedic core.

metas.name: Disenchantment
metas.description: From Matt Groening (The Simpsons, Futurama), this animated fantasy-comedy offers adventure and laughs in a medieval setting, fitting the viewer's appreciation for animated sci-fi/fantasy comedies.

metas.name: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds
metas.description: A fun, optimistic, and episodic take on the Star Trek universe, focusing on adventure and camaraderie. This aligns with the 'fun action adventures' and 'feel-good' aspects of 'Doctor Who' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Orville
metas.description: A loving homage to classic Star Trek with a comedic twist. It balances sci-fi adventure with character-driven humor, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Doctor Who (2005)
metas.description: Given the user watched the new Doctor Who, the original run (starting from 2005) offers a vast library of imaginative sci-fi adventures with a similar blend of fun and drama.

metas.name: Stargate SG-1
metas.description: A long-running sci-fi adventure series with a strong emphasis on exploration, teamwork, and lighthearted banter, offering a similar adventurous spirit to 'Doctor Who' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Leverage: Redemption
metas.description: A fun, heist-based action-adventure series where a team of skilled individuals takes down corrupt individuals and corporations. It's clever, action-packed, and has a strong sense of justice, fitting 'fun action adventures'.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky and mind-bending sci-fi comedy with a unique approach to mystery and adventure, appealing to fans of the more surreal elements in 'Rick and Morty' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Killjoys
metas.description: A fun, fast-paced sci-fi action series with a charismatic cast and a good mix of humor and adventure. It offers a lighter take on space opera, similar to 'Futurama's' adventurous spirit.

metas.name: Wynonna Earp
metas.description: A supernatural western with a strong female lead, witty dialogue, and plenty of action. It's got a fun, slightly irreverent tone that fans of 'Brassic' and 'Doctor Who' might enjoy.

metas.name: The Librarians
metas.description: A lighthearted fantasy adventure series about a group who protect magical artifacts. It's full of charm, humor, and episodic quests, similar to the adventurous nature of 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Space Force
metas.description: A workplace comedy set in the US Space Force, featuring Steve Carell. It offers satirical humor and a quirky premise, appealing to fans of ensemble comedies like 'The Office' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Silicon Valley
metas.description: A sharp, witty comedy about the tech industry that balances observational humor with absurd situations, reminiscent of the clever writing in 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: A classic British sitcom with a unique brand of geeky humor and memorable characters, similar in its observational comedy style to 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Mythic Quest
metas.description: A workplace comedy set in a video game studio. It's funny, sometimes surprisingly poignant, and offers a peek into a niche industry with relatable characters.

metas.name: Impractical Jokers
metas.description: A hidden gem of pure, unadulterated fun. Four friends dare each other to do hilariously embarrassing public stunts. It's light, silly, and guaranteed to make you laugh.

metas.name: Toast of London
metas.description: A surreal and brilliantly witty comedy about a struggling actor. Its unique humor and eccentric characters will appeal to fans of 'It's Always Sunny's' more outlandish comedic moments.

metas.name: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
metas.description: A cult classic mockumentary that hilariously parodies low-budget 80s horror. Its dry wit and absurdity would resonate with fans of 'It's Always Sunny' and the unconventional humor of 'Goodness Gracious Me'.
